title: SBI aims to sell its Yes Bank stake worth Rs 18,420 cr by end-March
description: State Bank of India (SBI) plans to sell its 24% stake in Yes Bank, worth $2.2 billion, by March. Japanese Sumitomo Mitsui and Dubai's Emirates NBD are vying for a majority stake. The Reserve Bank of India has verbally approved the deal, with regulatory and due diligence discussions ongoing.
